nml_option.name: config_hurricane_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels for hurricane.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 2.

nml_option.name: config_hurricane_min_depth
nml_option.description: Minimum depth for hurricane mesh bathymetry.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_hurricane_max_depth
nml_option.description: Maximum depth for hurricane mesh bathymetry.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_hurricane_gaussian_hump_amplitude
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_hurricane_use_gaussian_hump
nml_option.description: Use of idealized gaussian hump 'hurricane' initial condition.

nml_option.name: config_hurricane_gaussian_lon_center
nml_option.description: Longitude of center of gaussian wave.

nml_option.name: config_hurricane_gaussian_lat_center
nml_option.description: Latitude of center of gaussian wave.

nml_option.name: config_hurricane_land_z_limit
nml_option.description: Vertical elevation corresponding to increased drag on land (bottom depth positive).

nml_option.name: config_hurricane_marsh_z_limit
nml_option.description: Vertical elevation corresponding to increased drag on marsh (bottom depth positive).

nml_option.name: config_hurricane_land_drag
nml_option.description: Value of land drag for either Cd or Manning's n above config_land_z_limit.

nml_option.name: config_hurricane_marsh_drag
nml_option.description: Value of marsh drag between config_marsh_z_limit and config_land_z_limit for either Cd or Manning's n.

nml_option.name: config_hurricane_channel_drag
nml_option.description: Value of channel drag below config_marsh_z_limit for either Cd or Manning's n.
